metadata.Title: CVE-2016-5537 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: Unspecified vulnerability in the NetBeans component in Oracle Fusion Middleware 8.1 allows local users to affect confidentiality, integrity, and availability via unknown vectors. NOTE: the previous information is from the October 2016 CPU. Oracle has not commented on third-party claims that this issue is a directory traversal vulnerability which allows local users with certain permissions to write to arbitrary files and consequently gain privileges via a .. (dot dot) in a archive entry in a ZIP file imported as a project.

criterions.comment: netbeans package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '10.0-3').
